author: The Irish Times
title: Man in court charged with murder of Kilkenny pensioner
description: Trevor Rowe (38) remanded in custody after he was accused over death of Anne Butler (71)
content:
A man (28) has appeared in court charged with the murder of Kilkenny pensioner Anne Butler.
Trevor Rowe, Abbey Street, Kilkenny was remanded in custody after he was charged with the murder of the 71-year-old at her home at Maudlin Street in the city on March… [+2019 chars]
